data.message: The Constraint Ladder is a repeatable creativity method: Round 0 (baseline) → Round 1 (ban your crutch) → Round 2 (cross-domain lens) → Round 3 (taste risk). Score each on Coherence, Novelty, Taste, Energy, Honesty. The winning version usually comes from Round 2 (cross-domain) because it forces structure without randomness. Round 3 (taste risk) wins on memorability but can sacrifice coherence.
